about_the_game:
Adds the "Tropical Summer" swimming costume for Ryza.

Note:
- Costumes can be changed in the “Changing Room” accessible through the desk in the Atelier. Characters need to join the party before their costumes can be changed.
- This item is included in the “Atelier Ryza 2: Season Pass” and “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy Ultimate Edition” sets.
